data.message:
Dear Facebook, 
Can You please tell us what we need to do if we want to have Verified Page? This is our page https://www.facebook.com/najljepsicitati 

Thank you :)

replies.message: Thanks for the question, Amilia. We don't currently accept requests for verified profiles from the public. You can learn more through our Help Center at: http://on.fb.me/1vA7qeC -Sarah

I read that, yet. But there are a lot of pages with the same name like ours. Btw,  there are a lot of Verified Pages who have 100k fans, and we have more than 400k, so I think that we absolutely deserve to be Verified Page, too. Just think about that option.

Best wishes. :D
